title: Lenders to focus on credit vetting of Jan Dhan accounts
description: Banks are boosting credit assessment processes, utilizing social media analytics to evaluate Jan Dhan account holders for consumption loans. With an emphasis on productive lending and government schemes, they remain cautious amid rising personal loan stress and RBI's warning on unsecured loan growth.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
